START A BLOG. Don't keep giving your keystrokes to companies that aren't YOU. Own your words or your words are WASTED. https://t.co/uY9DdumqtL

Benefits to you? You get words in front of the following you built here. It's Medium, again, inside the Twitter Walled Garden

Benefits to Twitter? You stay inside their app

Problem? You don't control your words, the URL, the SEO, the rel=canonical, etc. Own your own domain.

Second, keep notes of things to study. Surprisingly few folks keep track of what to learn. 

Third, study groups, lean on friends. You can‚Äôt do this by staying yo later.
